Lyric:
[by:halfsjw]
[ti:Colors]
[ar:Halsey]
[al:BADLANDS]
[by:halfsjw]
[00:05.03]Your little brother never tells you but he loves you so
[00:09.57]You said your mother only smiled on her TV show
[00:14.28]You're only happy when your sorry head is filled with dope
[00:19.13]I hope you make it to the day you're 28 years old

[00:24.50]You're dripping like a saturated sunrise
[00:28.89]You're spilling like an overflowing sink
[00:33.50]You're ripped at every edge but you're a masterpiece
[00:38.50]And now you're tearing through the pages and the ink

[00:45.51]Everything is blue
[00:47.51]His pills, his hands, his jeans
[00:50.47]And now I'm covered in the colors
[00:53.43]Pulled apart at the seams
[00:55.33]And it's blue
[01:00.03]And it's blue

[01:04.38]Everything is grey
[01:06.68]His hair, his smoke, his dreams
[01:09.69]And now he's so devoid of color
[01:12.09]He don't know what it means
[01:14.19]And he's blue
[01:18.61]And he's blue

[01:24.06]You were a vision in the morning when the light came through
[01:28.51]I know I've only felt religion when I've lied with you
[01:33.31]You said you'll never be forgiven 'til your boys are too
[01:37.86]And I'm still waking every morning but it's not with you

[01:43.48]You're dripping like a saturated sunrise
[01:48.25]You're spilling like an overflowing sink
[01:52.80]You're ripped at every edge but you're a masterpiece
[01:57.39]And now you're tearing through the pages and the ink

[02:01.54]Everything is blue
[02:03.89]His pills, his hands, his jeans
[02:06.94]And now I'm covered in the colors
[02:09.94]Pulled apart at the seams
[02:11.59]And it's blue
[02:16.70]And it's blue

[02:20.80]Everything is grey
[02:23.00]His hair, his smoke, his dreams
[02:26.10]And now he's so devoid of color
[02:28.61]He don't know what it means
[02:30.66]And he's blue
[02:35.35]And he's blue

[02:44.02]You were red and you liked me 'cause I was blue
[02:51.04]You touched me and suddenly I was a lilac sky
[02:55.93]And you decided purple just wasn't for you

[03:00.06]Everything is blue
[03:01.87]His pills, his hands, his jeans
[03:05.07]And now I'm covered in the colors
[03:07.93]Pulled apart at the seams
[03:09.58]And it's blue
[03:14.40]And it's blue

[03:23.90]And now he's so devoid of color
[03:26.80]He don't know what it means
[03:28.61]And he's blue
